name: @unified-repo-analyzer/shared
description: Shared types and utilities for the Unified Repository Analyzer

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:types
scripts.build:bundle: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --sourcemap && bun build src/browser.ts --outdir dist --target browser --sourcemap
scripts.test: bun test || npm test --silent || echo "No npm tests configured"

author: Unified Repository Analyzer Contributors
